version_description:
修复已知bug
优化用户体验

* [Feature] iCloud backup and restore. Same Apple account under different equipment, direct backup and recovery, do not worry about important anniversary days will be missing.
* [Feature] Today Widget Support two kinds of style selection. There will be more style next version.
* [Optimization] Reposition the settings page so that it looks more clearer.
* [Optimization] Theme page selection you can preview the effect do not need to go back to the home page.

If you like this update, consider leaving an evaluation in the App Store, which is very important to us
If you are not satisfied with this update, please contact us by mail thanks.

Email：immouseshi@gmail.com

* [Feature] Add more than two Today Widget styles to choose from.
* [Feature] Add a local album to save the days of the full screen mode screenshot, of course, you can also directly share the image to your friends.
* [Optimization] Home page top date has a dynamic digital effect.

If you like this update, consider leaving an evaluation in the App Store, which is very important to us
If you are not satisfied with this update, please contact us by mail thanks.

Email：immouseshi@gmail.com

* [Feature] Date Sort Mode. Now Support three sort modes: Default Mode、Target Date Mode and Earliest Date Mode.
* [Fixed] Today Widget can auto calculate date.
* [Optimization] Home Page date items highlight when selected item.

If you like this update, consider leaving an evaluation in the App Store, which is very important to us
If you are not satisfied with this update, please contact us by mail thanks.

Email：immouseshi@gmail.com

* [Fixed] Fixed Today Widget can not got and refresh day items.
* [Feature] Can auto calculate days when in app. No need to open mydays app again

If you like this update, consider leaving an evaluation in the App Store, which is very important to us
If you are not satisfied with this update, please contact us by mail thanks.

Email：immouseshi@gmail.com

* [Features] Add a notice of commemoration and allow the selection of notification time
* [Features] Supports Korean, Russian, French
* [Optimization] Optimized for screens such as iPhone 6\7
* [Optimization] Remove the arrow and use the text to indicate the day distance
* [Optimization] partial icon optimization

If you like this update, please consider leaving a comment on the App Store, which is very important to us
If you are not satisfied with this update, please contact us via e-mail with Twitter, thanks

Email:immouseshi@gmail.com

* [Features] Add a Christmas theme and wish everyone a Merry Christmas!
* [Optimization] Part of icon optimization

If you like this update, please consider leaving a comment on the App Store, which is very important to us
If you are not satisfied with this update, please contact us via e-mail with Twitter, thanks

Email:immouseshi@gmail.com

* Add a new theme mode.
* Add lunar date selection function.

*[优化]修改icon和启动图
*[优化]修改已知bug

[修复]修改数据不能显示问题
[优化]分类名称过滤

全新改版
[功能]全新UI页面
[功能]新增用户体系,实时同步你的记录
[新增]新增历史上的今天
[优化]修复已知Bug

1.新增记录瞬间的功能，可以添加照片和定位
2.事件增加“重复”选项，可设置倒数日、正数日
3.听取了广大用户的意见，可以关闭“历史上的今天”啦！
4. 首页列表数据增加快捷方式：左滑编辑、删除
